author: publisher12
title: BHEL Bhopal Recruitment 2017 – 744 Trade Apprentice & Sr Resident Posts

organizations.name: medical council of india/ state medical council

text: 7. Draftsman Mechanic: 15 Posts 8. Electronic Mechanic: 13 Posts 9. Mechanic Motor Vehicle: 17 Posts 10. Machinist Grinder: 10 Posts 11. Mason: 05 Posts 12. Painter (General): 07 Posts Age Limit : Candidates age limit should be between 14 – 25 years as on 31-03-2017. Age relaxation is applicable as per rules. Educational Qualification : Candidates should have passed 10th/ ITI or its equivalent qualification from a recognised University. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on competitive examination & interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.bhelbpl.co.in from 01-01-2017 to 31-01-2017 till midnight. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying online candidates should have valid email id and Contact No. 2. Candidates are neatly scanned the photograph, Signature & relevant documents at the time of apply online. 3. Log on to the website www.bhelbpl.co.in 4. Click on Job & Careers. 5. Select the Desired Post. 6. Click on New Applicants—–> Apply. 7. Fill all the mandatory details. 8. Take print out of application form & send it to relevant address mentioned above. Important Dates: Starting Date to Apply Online: 01-01-2017 Last Date to Apply Online: 31-01-2017 till midnight. Last date for receiving Documents: 07-02-2017 For more details like pay scale, experience, reservation, duration & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Apply Online - BHEL Bhopal Recruitment 2017 – Senior Resident Posts: Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited (BHEL), Bhopal has issued a notification for the recruitment of Senior Resident vacancies in various disciplines. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 15-02-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… BHEL Bhopal Vacancy Details: Name of the Posts: Senior Resident Name of the Specialty/ Discipline: 1. Medicine: 02 Posts 3. Obs & Gyn: 02 Posts Age Limit: Candidates upper age should be 35 years as on 01-01-2017. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess PG Degree/ Diploma recognized by Medical Council of India, must be registered with Medical Council of India/ State Medical Council. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates send their application with complete details in the prescribed format along with photocopies of all relevant certificates as mentioned in the notification, experience & envelope should be superscribed with “Application for Senior Resident” to DGM (HR), HRM Dept., 5th Floor, Administrative Building, BHEL, Piplani, Bhopal 462022 on or before 15-02-2017. Last Date for Submission of Application: 15-02-2017. For more details like reservation, remuneration, disciplines & other information click on the link given below….
